title: Four-manifolds, two-complexes and the quadratic bias invariant
abstract:
Kreck and Schafer produced the first examples of stably diffeomorphic closed
smooth 4-manifolds which are not homotopy equivalent. They were constructed by
applying the doubling construction to 2-complexes over certain finite abelian
groups of odd order. By extending their methods, we formulate a new homotopy
invariant on the class of 4-manifolds arising as doubles of 2-complexes with
finite fundamental group. As an application we show that, for any $k \ge 2$,
there exist a family of $k$ closed smooth 4-manifolds which are all stably
diffeomorphic but are pairwise not homotopy equivalent.
